extendedInfo.description: That's right, your dreams of an almost minimal weather app have finally come true! In celebration of Apple's attempt with iOS 7 to make a "flat ui" we have come up with this great flat and almost minimal weather app! At it's core, it's very simple.... We strived to create the simplest user experience. A straight forward experience, to give you only the information you desire, the current temperature. We magically find your current location, and then give you the temperature. All without any interaction from you! No buttons means we magically do the work for you. Unlike iOS 7, this is tablet optimized!One more thing.... Want to refresh? Just simply swipe down and we handle the rest. It's just that easy.One more, one more thing.... Want to go full minimal weather? Then check out Absolute Minimal Weather. The ad free, pro featured minimal weather app!
